scripts.build:theme: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: lessc src/styles/style.less public/theme/pensionrut/css/style.css && cleancss -o public/theme/pensionrut/css/style.min.css public/theme/pensionrut/css/style.css
scripts.build:js: cat src/scripts/0-jquery-1.8.2.min.js src/scripts/jquery.easing-1.3.js src/scripts/jquery.iosslider.js src/scripts/bootstrap.min.js > public/theme/pensionrut/js/scripts.js && terser public/theme/pensionrut/js/scripts.js -o public/theme/pensionrut/js/scripts.min.js -c -m
